page.title: 11Bradford Farm-NE.of Tiverton
page.content: At the present time the farm land is being used by several different farmers. The owners have a sale of grass yearly and the highest bidder can either make hay or silage or run stock on the land he has obtained in the auction. The land is used from March to October. The Link Road,which was completed in 1984, cuts across some of the farmland but does not cause much inconvenience at the moment. However, the owners do intend to farm the land as a whole unit in the near future and then having to travel approximately one kilometre to get to two of their main fields will be time consuming. These fields and two others have also been cut off from their natural water supply. The owners now have to purchase water from the Water Authority.
